DOC.brief_title: Validation Jawbone Anatomy Classification Endosseous Dental Implant Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The study aim . assess reliability validity purpose jawbone anatomy clinical radiological classification . Objectives . - risk degree evaluation proper implantation . - radiological edentulous jaw segment assessment accord study protocol classification validation reliability . - intraoperative evaluation surgery ( dental implant placement edentulous jaw segment ( EJS ) type I type II ) accord study protocol : reliability new propose classification evaluation . - postoperative radiological edentulous jaw segment evaluation accuracy classification identification . - implant treatment success evaluation final crown placement . Object research . partially edentulous patient refer dentist dental specialist necessity dental implant treatment . Expected result . - high accuracy propose classification proper implantation risk degree evaluation . - propose classification system base anatomical radiological jawbone quantity quality evaluation helpful tool planning treatment strategy collaboration among specialist . - good interobserver reliability clinical radiological edentulous jaw segment evaluation clinician . - good reliability radiological intraoperative investigation postoperative data . Granted Approvals . - Kaunas Regional Biomedical Research Ethics Committee approval . - State Data Protection Inspectorate approval . Additional study quality factor . - periodical session Clinic Maxillofacial Surgery regard Phd study intermediate result certification . - periodical certification committee PhD study . Patients sample . inclusion criterion fulfil patient selection dental implant treatment . Size research . Patients refer dentist dental specialist Lithuania center participate study.Total sample size le 80 - 100 edentulous jaw segment . The duration study one year sample gathering ( 2014 ) . Material method . Dental notation : World Dental Association ( FDI ) dental notation system . The length measurement system metric ( millimetre integer number accord mathematical rule ) . Non linear measurement value provide : `` + '' - agreement , `` - '' - disagreement . Separate stage study document - digital picture ( protocol requirement ) take . The international study base classification ( please find first article list publication ) . The investigation unit edentulous jaw segment aesthetic non aesthetic zone . Aesthetic zone contain incisive , canine premolar edentulous jaw segment . Molar region edentulous jaw segment belong non aesthetic zone . The propose classification accuracy evaluate edentulous jaw segment preoperative , intraoperative , early postoperative late postoperative stage correspond parameter comparison aesthetic non aesthetic zone ( evaluation correspond parameter different separate stage ) . DOC.criteria: 1. general systematically healthy ( American Society Anaesthesiologists I II ) subject age 18 year old woman men availability complete clinical record compliance requirement study sign inform consent absence allergy dental implant alloy 2. local subject one single limit neighbour teeth side edentulous jaw segment tooth lose two month earlier prior study adjacent edentulous jaw segment implant adjacent teeth intact defective restoration cementoenamel junction patient wear kind removable prosthesis treatment area 1. local acute infection region edentulous jaw segment active periodontal disease current orthodontic periodontal treatment heavy smoker ( 10 cigarette day ) untreated teeth defective restoration potentially exacerbate study wisdom tooth edentulous jaw segment edentulous jaw segment unerupted tooth central lateral low incisor edentulous jaw segment ( individual case relate treatment planning ) 2. general : pregnancy lactate mother history alcoholism drug abuse bone disorder ( Paget 's disease , osteoporosis , hyperparathyroidism ) history intravenous ( IV ) bisphosphonate use neurologic psychiatric disorder , systemic infection chronic use medication know affect periodontal status ( calcium antagonist , anticonvulsives , immunosuppressive , antiinflammatory medication ) diseases immune system medical condition may influence treatment outcome ( e.g . uncontrolled diabetes )
